channel.title: prometheus on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in prometheus on Ross A. Baker

item.description: Had a fun conversation with a @zachmccoy about graphing second derivatives with Prometheus, until we realized I did that with another backend a couple years before Prometheus came to prominence, and now One Derivative Is Enough For Anybody. Also fondly remembering my third derivative, which was mostly useful so I could call it The Jerk Graph. #Prometheus #Calculus
